column3: str

※本任务为<hex:024804F201F603><hex:024904F201F703><hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> 职业固定任务，<hex:02100103>　需要与接受任务时的职业相同才可继续进行任务。<hex:02100103>※另外，本任务无法直接从日志放弃。<hex:02100103>　需要放弃时请和阿尔达希尔进行对话。<hex:02100103><hex:02100103>盖罗尔特委托冒险者收集<hex:022811FF0A>EventItem<hex:F61E8C6E0103>、<hex:022811FF0A>EventItem<hex:F61E8C6F0103>、<hex:022811FF0A>EventItem<hex:F61E8C700103>。突破神圣遗迹无限城市街古迹可获得<hex:022811FF0A>EventItem<hex:F61E8C6E0103>，突破秘本宝库迦巴勒幻想图书馆可获得<hex:022811FF0A>EventItem<hex:F61E8C6F0103>，突破天山深境索姆阿尔灵峰可获得<hex:022811FF0A>EventItem<hex:F61E8C700103>。<hex:02100103><hex:02100103>※可以通过任务搜索器参加。
集齐了3种材料。使用接受任务时的职业并将元灵武器装备上或放在兵装库、背包中，将<hex:022811FF0A>EventItem<hex:F61E8C6E0103>、<hex:022811FF0A>EventItem<hex:F61E8C6F0103>、<hex:022811FF0A>EventItem<hex:F61E8C700103>交给螺旋港的盖罗尔特。
盖罗尔特准备开始制作人造元灵的武器身体。阿尔达希尔要和冒险者开始携手制作<hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F242240103>。使用接受任务时的职业并将元灵武器装备上或放在兵装库、背包中，和加工系统对话。
阿尔达希尔进行了<hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F242240103>的相关说明。需要再次和加工系统对话才可着手制作<hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F242240103>。使用接受任务时的职业并将元灵武器装备上或放在兵装库、背包中，和认证系统对话。

从阿尔达希尔手中获得了<hex:022811FF0A>EventItem<hex:F61E8C6D0103>。装备接受任务时职业对应的元灵武器·灵慧攻略特定的各副本任务，可以提升灵魂凝聚度。将灵魂凝聚度提升到最大后，使用接受任务时的职业并将元灵武器装备上或放在兵装库、背包中，再次和认证系统对话。<hex:02100103><hex:02100103>※<hex:022811FF0A>EventItem<hex:F61E8C6D0103>如若遗失，可与螺旋港的阿尔达希尔对话再度领取。
经认证系统检测，通过了亚拉戈帝国魔科学部特级以太密度认证。使用接受任务时的职业并换下元灵武器放在兵装库或背包中，将<hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F242240103>和元灵武器·灵慧交给盖罗尔特。
在阿尔达希尔、盖罗尔特和冒险者的努力下，元灵武器终于完成了。展现出了真正姿态的人造元灵也显得非常高兴。今后的路，元灵武器将伴冒险者一路同行。<hex:02100103><hex:02100103>※在田园郡的乌兰处可以对元灵武器的属性进行重新调整。

携带或装备<hex:0208F2016EE4E80514FF20><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B850103>与<hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B920103><hex:FFF20145><hex:0208F2013FE4E80515FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B860103><hex:FFF20127><hex:0208F20121E4E80516FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B870103><hex:FFF20109><hex:0208F20103E4E80517FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B880103><hex:FFF0EC><hex:0208F0E7E4E80518FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B890103><hex:FFF0D0><hex:0208CDE4E80519FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8D0103><hex:FFB7><hex:0208B3E4E8051AFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8E0103><hex:FF9D><hex:020899E4E8051CFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8F0103><hex:FF83><hex:02087FE4E8051DFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B900103><hex:FF69><hex:020865E4E8051FFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8A0103><hex:FF4F><hex:02084BE4E80520FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8C0103><hex:FF35><hex:020831E4E80521FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8B0103><hex:FF1B><hex:020817E4E80522FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B910103><hex:FF01><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:02100103>突破神圣遗迹无限城市街古迹<hex:02100103>获取<hex:022811FF0A>EventItem<hex:F61E8C6E0103>

携带或装备<hex:0208F2016EE4E80514FF20><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B850103>与<hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B920103><hex:FFF20145><hex:0208F2013FE4E80515FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B860103><hex:FFF20127><hex:0208F20121E4E80516FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B870103><hex:FFF20109><hex:0208F20103E4E80517FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B880103><hex:FFF0EC><hex:0208F0E7E4E80518FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B890103><hex:FFF0D0><hex:0208CDE4E80519FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8D0103><hex:FFB7><hex:0208B3E4E8051AFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8E0103><hex:FF9D><hex:020899E4E8051CFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8F0103><hex:FF83><hex:02087FE4E8051DFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B900103><hex:FF69><hex:020865E4E8051FFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8A0103><hex:FF4F><hex:02084BE4E80520FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8C0103><hex:FF35><hex:020831E4E80521FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8B0103><hex:FF1B><hex:020817E4E80522FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B910103><hex:FF01><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:02100103>突破秘本宝库迦巴勒幻想图书馆<hex:02100103>获取<hex:022811FF0A>EventItem<hex:F61E8C6F0103>

携带或装备<hex:0208F2016EE4E80514FF20><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B850103>与<hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B920103><hex:FFF20145><hex:0208F2013FE4E80515FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B860103><hex:FFF20127><hex:0208F20121E4E80516FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B870103><hex:FFF20109><hex:0208F20103E4E80517FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B880103><hex:FFF0EC><hex:0208F0E7E4E80518FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B890103><hex:FFF0D0><hex:0208CDE4E80519FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8D0103><hex:FFB7><hex:0208B3E4E8051AFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8E0103><hex:FF9D><hex:020899E4E8051CFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8F0103><hex:FF83><hex:02087FE4E8051DFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B900103><hex:FF69><hex:020865E4E8051FFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8A0103><hex:FF4F><hex:02084BE4E80520FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8C0103><hex:FF35><hex:020831E4E80521FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8B0103><hex:FF1B><hex:020817E4E80522FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B910103><hex:FF01><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:02100103>突破天山深境索姆阿尔灵峰<hex:02100103>获取<hex:022811FF0A>EventItem<hex:F61E8C700103>

携带或装备<hex:0208F2016EE4E80514FF20><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B850103>与<hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B920103><hex:FFF20145><hex:0208F2013FE4E80515FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B860103><hex:FFF20127><hex:0208F20121E4E80516FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B870103><hex:FFF20109><hex:0208F20103E4E80517FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B880103><hex:FFF0EC><hex:0208F0E7E4E80518FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B890103><hex:FFF0D0><hex:0208CDE4E80519FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8D0103><hex:FFB7><hex:0208B3E4E8051AFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8E0103><hex:FF9D><hex:020899E4E8051CFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8F0103><hex:FF83><hex:02087FE4E8051DFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B900103><hex:FF69><hex:020865E4E8051FFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8A0103><hex:FF4F><hex:02084BE4E80520FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8C0103><hex:FF35><hex:020831E4E80521FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8B0103><hex:FF1B><hex:020817E4E80522FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B910103><hex:FF01><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:02100103>将收集到的材料交给螺旋港的盖罗尔特

携带或装备<hex:0208F2016EE4E80514FF20><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B850103>与<hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B920103><hex:FFF20145><hex:0208F2013FE4E80515FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B860103><hex:FFF20127><hex:0208F20121E4E80516FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B870103><hex:FFF20109><hex:0208F20103E4E80517FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B880103><hex:FFF0EC><hex:0208F0E7E4E80518FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B890103><hex:FFF0D0><hex:0208CDE4E80519FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8D0103><hex:FFB7><hex:0208B3E4E8051AFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8E0103><hex:FF9D><hex:020899E4E8051CFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8F0103><hex:FF83><hex:02087FE4E8051DFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B900103><hex:FF69><hex:020865E4E8051FFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8A0103><hex:FF4F><hex:02084BE4E80520FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8C0103><hex:FF35><hex:020831E4E80521FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8B0103><hex:FF1B><hex:020817E4E80522FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B910103><hex:FF01><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:02100103>和加工系统对话

携带或装备<hex:0208F2016EE4E80514FF20><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B850103>与<hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B920103><hex:FFF20145><hex:0208F2013FE4E80515FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B860103><hex:FFF20127><hex:0208F20121E4E80516FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B870103><hex:FFF20109><hex:0208F20103E4E80517FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B880103><hex:FFF0EC><hex:0208F0E7E4E80518FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B890103><hex:FFF0D0><hex:0208CDE4E80519FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8D0103><hex:FFB7><hex:0208B3E4E8051AFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8E0103><hex:FF9D><hex:020899E4E8051CFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8F0103><hex:FF83><hex:02087FE4E8051DFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B900103><hex:FF69><hex:020865E4E8051FFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8A0103><hex:FF4F><hex:02084BE4E80520FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8C0103><hex:FF35><hex:020831E4E80521FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8B0103><hex:FF1B><hex:020817E4E80522FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B910103><hex:FF01><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:02100103>和认证系统对话

携带或装备<hex:0208F2016EE4E80514FF20><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B850103>与<hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B920103><hex:FFF20145><hex:0208F2013FE4E80515FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B860103><hex:FFF20127><hex:0208F20121E4E80516FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B870103><hex:FFF20109><hex:0208F20103E4E80517FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B880103><hex:FFF0EC><hex:0208F0E7E4E80518FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B890103><hex:FFF0D0><hex:0208CDE4E80519FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8D0103><hex:FFB7><hex:0208B3E4E8051AFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8E0103><hex:FF9D><hex:020899E4E8051CFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8F0103><hex:FF83><hex:02087FE4E8051DFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B900103><hex:FF69><hex:020865E4E8051FFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8A0103><hex:FF4F><hex:02084BE4E80520FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8C0103><hex:FF35><hex:020831E4E80521FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8B0103><hex:FF1B><hex:020817E4E80522FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B910103><hex:FF01><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:02100103>和认证系统对话

<hex:0208F201C0E3E802E803FF15>收集<hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F242240103><hex:FFF201A1>携带<hex:0208F2016EE4E80514FF20><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B850103>与<hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B920103><hex:FFF20145><hex:0208F2013FE4E80515FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B860103><hex:FFF20127><hex:0208F20121E4E80516FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B870103><hex:FFF20109><hex:0208F20103E4E80517FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B880103><hex:FFF0EC><hex:0208F0E7E4E80518FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B890103><hex:FFF0D0><hex:0208CDE4E80519FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8D0103><hex:FFB7><hex:0208B3E4E8051AFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8E0103><hex:FF9D><hex:020899E4E8051CFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8F0103><hex:FF83><hex:02087FE4E8051DFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B900103><hex:FF69><hex:020865E4E8051FFF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8A0103><hex:FF4F><hex:02084BE4E80520FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8C0103><hex:FF35><hex:020831E4E80521FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B8B0103><hex:FF1B><hex:020817E4E80522FF0F><hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F23B910103><hex:FF01><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:02100103>将<hex:02280BFF05>Item<hex:F242240103>交给盖罗尔特<hex:03>

在任务“人造元灵终绽放”中将获得当前<hex:020837E3E94509FF12><hex:02280EFF09>ClassJob<hex:E9450103><hex:FF1E><hex:02081AE1E94513FF12><hex:02280EFF09>ClassJob<hex:E9450103><hex:FF01><hex:03><hex:03>特职的元灵武器。<hex:02100103>要以<hex:020837E3E94509FF12><hex:02280EFF09>ClassJob<hex:E9450103><hex:FF1E><hex:02081AE1E94513FF12><hex:02280EFF09>ClassJob<hex:E9450103><hex:FF01><hex:03><hex:03>接受该任务吗？
要创造<hex:020837E3E94509FF12><hex:02280EFF09>ClassJob<hex:E9450103><hex:FF1E><hex:02081AE1E94513FF12><hex:02280EFF09>ClassJob<hex:E9450103><hex:FF01><hex:03><hex:03>的元灵武器吗？
再考虑一下
创造<hex:020837E3E94509FF12><hex:02280EFF09>ClassJob<hex:E9450103><hex:FF1E><hex:02081AE1E94513FF12><hex:02280EFF09>ClassJob<hex:E9450103><hex:FF01><hex:03><hex:03>的元灵武器
接受任务“人造元灵终绽放”后，<hex:02100103>直至完成或放弃该任务，<hex:02100103>其间都无法同时以其他特职重复接受该任务。
请转换为与所需元灵武器相应的特职，<hex:02100103>再次和阿尔达希尔对话。
要接受任务“人造元灵终绽放”，<hex:02100103>需装备上<hex:02280AFF05>Item<hex:E8020103>与<hex:02280AFF05>Item<hex:E8030103>。
要接受任务“人造元灵终绽放”，<hex:02100103>需装备上<hex:02280AFF05>Item<hex:E8020103>。
已拥有<hex:02280AFF05>Item<hex:E8020103>和<hex:02280AFF05>Item<hex:E8030103>。<hex:02100103>请转换为其它特职，<hex:02100103>再次和阿尔达希尔对话。
已拥有<hex:02280AFF05>Item<hex:E8020103>。<hex:02100103>请转换为其它特职，<hex:02100103>再次和阿尔达希尔对话。
<hex:022903EB0203>，好消息！<hex:02100103>我们找到办法修复坏掉的加工系统了。
不过由于基本上都是些我所学专业外的知识，<hex:02100103>所以实际修复工作还是要交给盖罗尔特先生来做……
只能说明你小子还差得远呢。<hex:02100103>这下感受到有本大爷在身边是多难能可贵了吧？
唔，这我无法反驳……<hex:02100103>但现在确实没时间让我从零开始<hex:02100103>学习亚拉戈的魔科学知识了。
所以我会贡献我的力量帮忙做力所能及的事情！<hex:02100103>绝不会看着你们出力自己却什么都不做！
哼，挺会说嘛。<hex:02100103>既然如此，那你就和<hex:022903EB0203>一起去收集<hex:02100103>之后锻造武器时需要的6种材料吧！
……好吧！<hex:02100103>为了人造元灵我也豁出去了……<hex:02100103>一定帮你们把材料收集齐！
<hex:022903EB0203>，事已至此，材料我们就分头收集吧！
你去负责获取神圣遗迹无限城市街古迹的<hex:022811FF0A>EventItem<hex:F61E8C6E0103>、<hex:02100103>秘本宝库迦巴勒幻想图书馆的<hex:022811FF0A>EventItem<hex:F61E8C6F0103>。
最后还有天山深境索姆阿尔灵峰的<hex:022811FF0A>EventItem<hex:F61E8C700103>。
全都收集到之后就拿来交给盖罗尔特先生吧！<hex:02100103>另外3种我一定想办法弄到，我们一起加油！
这次也咱们两个分头去收集材料吧！
